articles.author: Nicholas Megaw, Eric Platt, Costas Mourselas
articles.title: Bill Ackman postpones Pershing Square IPO after scaling back expectations - Financial Times
articles.description: Delay marks a setback for the billionaire hedge fund manager who hoped for one of the largest listings in history
articles.content: Bill Ackman has postponed the initial public offering of his US investment fund Pershing Square USA, days after he acknowledged that it would raise far less money than initially planned and pleaded w… [+3302 chars]
